sentences.en: Acceptance of women preachers varies greatly from denomination to denomination.
sentences.cn: 对于女性牧师的接受，各教派差异很大。

sentences.en: Realizing that this type of hyperinflation and denomination increase was not sustainable, the Pengo was replaced by the Forint.
sentences.cn: 意识到了这种程度的恶性通货膨胀和面值的增加速度没法维持下去，匈牙利平格就被新货币福林所取代。

sentences.en: This so-called "denomination effect" can be a powerful predictor of consumer spending habits.
sentences.cn: 这种所谓的“计价效应”在预测消费习惯方面非常灵验。
